Author: linux-security@amazon.com
Title: Amazon Linux 2 - Docker 2.0 - ALAS2DOCKER-2021-005: medium priority package update for docker
Description:
Package updates are available for Amazon Linux 2 - Docker that fix the following vulnerabilities:
CVE-2018-10892:
	The default OCI Linux spec in oci/defaults{_linux}.go in Docker/Moby, from 1.11 to current, does not block /proc/acpi pathnames. The flaw allows an attacker to modify host's hardware like enabling/disabling Bluetooth or turning up/down keyboard brightness.
1598581: CVE-2018-10892 docker: container breakout without selinux in enforcing mode
